title: make: *** [geth] error 2
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
OS & Version: ubuntu 14.04
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

build/env.sh go install -v -ldflags '-X main.gitCommit=9e323d65b20c32ab1db40e8dde7172826e0e9c45' -tags opencl ./cmd/geth

make: **\* [geth] Error 2

If you want OpenCL GPU minding included (`--tags opencl`), you need the appropriate OpenCL libraries installed on your OS, as stated by the error message above:

```
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lOpenCL
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```
